gap.$description: tabs.list.gap — Gap between tabs (0px). Zero gap creates connected tabs that appear as a unified navigation bar. Individual tabs handle their own spacing via padding.

borderWidth.$description: tabs.list.borderWidth — Tab list bottom border width (1px). Subtle line separating tabs from content. The active indicator overlays this border.

xs.$description: tabs.tab.height.xs — Extra small tab height (28px). Use for: compact navigation, secondary tab sets, dense admin interfaces. Minimal vertical space.

sm.$description: tabs.tab.height.sm — Small tab height (32px). Use for: standard-density navigation, sidebar tabs, space-efficient layouts.

md.$description: tabs.tab.height.md — Medium tab height (36px). DEFAULT. Use for: most tab navigation, main content tabs, settings panels. Comfortable click/tap target.

lg.$description: tabs.tab.height.lg — Large tab height (40px). Use for: prominent navigation tabs, touch-optimized interfaces, hero section tabs.

xl.$description: tabs.tab.height.xl — Extra large tab height (48px). Use for: high-emphasis navigation, full-width primary tabs, maximum touch target size.

xs.$description: tabs.tab.padding.horizontal.xs — Extra small horizontal tab padding (10px). Compact spacing for xs tabs and dense navigation.

sm.$description: tabs.tab.padding.horizontal.sm — Small horizontal tab padding (12px). Standard padding for sm tabs and efficient layouts.

md.$description: tabs.tab.padding.horizontal.md — Medium horizontal tab padding (16px). DEFAULT. Comfortable padding for most tab navigation.

lg.$description: tabs.tab.padding.horizontal.lg — Large horizontal tab padding (20px). Generous padding for prominent tabs with breathing room.

xl.$description: tabs.tab.padding.horizontal.xl — Extra large horizontal tab padding (32px). Maximum padding for high-emphasis, spacious tabs.

xs.$description: tabs.tab.fontSize.xs — Extra small tab font size (12px). Compact text for xs tabs. Use for secondary or crowded navigation.

sm.$description: tabs.tab.fontSize.sm — Small tab font size (14px). Standard text size for most tab navigation. Readable and space-efficient.

md.$description: tabs.tab.fontSize.md — Medium tab font size (14px). DEFAULT. Same as sm - keeps tabs subordinate to main content while remaining readable.

lg.$description: tabs.tab.fontSize.lg — Large tab font size (16px). Larger text for prominent tabs. Good for hero navigation or limited tab count.

xl.$description: tabs.tab.fontSize.xl — Extra large tab font size (16px). Same as lg - maintains readability without becoming oversized headers.

default.$description: tabs.tab.fontWeight.default — Default (inactive) tab font weight (400). Regular weight for inactive tabs keeps them visually subordinate.

active.$description: tabs.tab.fontWeight.active — Active tab font weight (500). Medium weight provides subtle emphasis for the selected tab without being too heavy.

borderRadius.$description: tabs.tab.borderRadius — Tab border radius (4px). Used for 'pills' variant tabs where each tab has a rounded background. Not visible in default underlined tabs.

height.$description: tabs.indicator.height — Indicator height (2px). Thin underline below active tab. Visible enough to clearly indicate selection without being heavy.

borderRadius.$description: tabs.indicator.borderRadius — Indicator border radius (2px). Slightly rounded ends soften the indicator line. Barely perceptible but adds polish.

top.$description: tabs.panel.padding.top — Panel top padding (16px). Space between tab bar and panel content. Provides visual separation without excessive gap.

duration.$description: tabs.transition.duration — Tab transition duration (100ms). Fast transitions for snappy tab switching. Indicator animation and hover states.

easing.$description: tabs.transition.easing — Tab transition easing (ease-out). Smooth deceleration for indicator movement and state changes.
